analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma duka tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa ppaṭigha duka sa nidassana ttika

original: Nasappaṭighaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sappaṭigham na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sappaṭighaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: Naappaṭighaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: na appaṭigham na sa nidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sappaṭighaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka
na sappaṭigham na sa nidassana sappaṭighañca na appaṭigham na sa nidassana sappaṭighañca

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca sappaṭighaḥ sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā eka

original: (Sabbattha tīṇi.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: sabbattha tīṇi hetuyā tīṇi adhipatiyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Nasappaṭighaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho anidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na sappaṭigham na anidassana sappaṭigham dhammam paṭicca sappaṭighaḥ anidassana sappaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Naappaṭighaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: na appaṭigham na anidassana appaṭigham dhammam paṭicca appaṭighaḥ anidassana appaṭighaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka
